languages.text: {n}При звуке вашего голоса слуга когитатора, чей окованный бронзой скелет вмонтирован в корпус когитатора, вздрагивает. Со скрежетом его череп поворачивается к вам и замирает в таком положении.{/n}

{n}At the sound of your voice, the cogitator's servant, whose bronze-bound skeleton is built into the cogitator housing, shudders — with a screech, its skull rotates toward you and then stops in that position.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}При звуке вашего голоса слуга когитатора, чей окованный бронзой скелет вмонтирован в корпус когитатора, вздрагивает. Со скрежетом его череп поворачивается к вам и замирает в таком положении.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}At the sound of your voice, the servitor mounted on the cogitator housing jerks into motion — with a screech, its head rotates toward you and then stops in that position.{/n}
{n}At the sound of your voice, the servitor mounted on the cogitator housing jerks into motion — with a screech, its head rotates toward you and then stops in that position.{/n}
{n}At the sound of your voice, the servitor mounted on the cogitator housing jerks into motion — with a screech, its head rotates toward you and then stops in that position.{/n}

{n}At the sound of your voice, the cogitator's servant, whose bronze-bound skeleton is built into the cogitator housing, shudders — with a screech, its skull rotates toward you and then stops in that position.{/n}

{n}At the sound of your voice, the cogitator's servant, whose bronze-bound skeleton is built into the cogitator housing, shudders — with a screech, its skull rotates toward you and then stops in that position.{/n}

languages.text: {n}听到你的声音之后，安置在沉思者外壳上的机仆突然颤抖起来。伴着刺耳的机械声，它将头朝你转了过来，之后直直地僵在那里。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the sound of your voice, the cogitator's servant, whose bronze-bound skeleton is built into the cogitator housing, shudders — with a screech, its skull rotates toward you and then stops in that position.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你话音刚落，安置在思考器外壳上的奴工突然剧烈抽搐起来。随着一声尖叫，它将头朝你转了过来，之后直直地僵在那里。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの声で、考算機の筐体に搭載された青銅製の骨格を持つ従者が動き出し、甲高い音とともに頭をこちらに回転させ、その位置で停止する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the sound of your voice, the cogitator's servant, whose bronze-bound skeleton is built into the cogitator housing, shudders — with a screech, its skull rotates toward you and then stops in that position.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの声で、考算機の筐体に搭載された青銅製の骨格を持つ従者が動き出し、甲高い音とともに頭をこちらに回転させ、その位置で停止する。{/n}
{n}あなたの声で、考算機の筐体に搭載された青銅製の骨格を持つ従者が動き出し、甲高い音とともに頭をこちらに回転させ、その位置で停止する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Beim Geräusch deiner Stimme erzittert der Diener des Cogitators, dessen bronzenegebundenes Skelett in das Gehäuse des Cogitators integriert ist – mit einem Knirschen dreht er dir seinen Kopf zu und verharrt dann in dieser Position.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the sound of your voice, the cogitator's servant, whose bronze-bound skeleton is built into the cogitator housing, shudders — with a screech, its skull rotates toward you and then stops in that position.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Beim Geräusch deiner Stimme setzt sich der auf dem Cogitator-Gehäuse montierte Servitor in Bewegung – mit einem Kreischen dreht er dir seinen Kopf zu und verharrt dann in dieser Position.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Au son de votre voix, le serviteur dont le squelette bardé de bronze est intégré au châssis du cogitateur se met à frémir et, dans un grincement saccadé, pivote dans votre direction et s'immobilise à nouveau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the sound of your voice, the cogitator's servant, whose bronze-bound skeleton is built into the cogitator housing, shudders — with a screech, its skull rotates toward you and then stops in that position.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au son de votre voix, le servitor monté sur la structure du cogitateur se met en mouvement et, dans un grincement saccadé, pivote dans votre direction et s'immobilise à nouveau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ante el sonido de tu voz, el sirviente del cogitador, cuyo esqueleto envuelto en bronce está integrado en la carcasa del cogitador, se estremece. Con un chirrido, gira la cabeza hacia ti y se detiene en esa posición.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the sound of your voice, the cogitator's servant, whose bronze-bound skeleton is built into the cogitator housing, shudders — with a screech, its skull rotates toward you and then stops in that position.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ante el sonido de tu voz, el servidor instalado en el armazón del cogitador se activa con una sacudida. Su cabeza chirría mientras rota para mirarte y se detiene, expectante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bronz kaplı iskeleti kavramsayarın kasasına monte hizmetkâr, sesine tepki vererek titriyor. Kurukafası, tiz bir sesle sana çevriliyor ve o pozisyonda kalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the sound of your voice, the cogitator's servant, whose bronze-bound skeleton is built into the cogitator housing, shudders — with a screech, its skull rotates toward you and then stops in that position.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kavramsayarın üzerine kurulmuş bronz kaplı iskelet hizmetkârı, sesine tepki vererek titriyor. Tiz bir sesle kurukafasını sana doğru çeviriyor ve o şekilde duruyor.{/n}
